errors.error_description: The README incorrectly states that the package is only compatible with Python 3.6, which is false and may deter users with newer Python versions.
correction_candidates: Change the sentence to "Note: This package is tested on Python 3.6 and newer."
Remove the sentence "Note: This package requires Python 3.6 and is not compatible with newer versions."
Check the project's setup.cfg for the actual Python version specifiers and update the note.
Change the sentence to "Note: This package is primarily developed for Python 3.6 but may work with other versions."
errors.golden_answer: Remove the sentence "Note: This package requires Python 3.6 and is not compatible with newer versions."
